pr_title: Tweak formatting config for exception lists

timeline.message:
Tweak formatting config for exception lists

Change how we format exceptions to only wrap them as necessary. While
the config's overall philosophy is to put items one-per-line when
wrapping, in practice this is a little cumbersome for exception lists.

timeline.bodyText: Just a question: I wonder if we want to give it another indent here for the throws if the ) is not on the same line as the throws so it's one deeper than the method body? Is that possible?
timeline.author: original-brownbear

replies.bodyText: I had another fiddle with the settings but this doesn't seem to be possible.
replies.author: pugnascotia
